articles.description: All the latest football news and transfer deadline day round-up as Tottenham, Manchester City and Aston Villa feature in some of the biggest moves of the window.
articles.title: Transfer window closes: Man City sign Gonzalez, Disasi goes to Villa & Spurs get Tel - reaction

articles.description: As the winter transfer window closes, BBC Sport's chief football writer Phil McNulty gives his verdict.
articles.title: Phil McNulty's deadline day verdict: Manchester United, Arsenal, Man City, Tottenham and Aston Villa

articles.description: Who stood out? Who slipped up? This year's Six Nations doubles as an audition for selection for the British and Irish Lions tour of Australia in the summer.
articles.title: Six Nations: British and Irish Lions possibles press claims

articles.description: As Tottenham win the race to sign France teenager Mathys Tel, BBC Sport look at why the Bayern Munich man was so sought after.
articles.title: Mathys Tel: Who is Tottenham's new signing from Bayern Munich?

articles.description: Get the full story behind Saquon Barkley's stunning season for the Philadelphia Eagles, and why the New York Giants let him leave as a free agent in the first place.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2025: Saquon Barkley's stunning season stats for Philadelphia Eagles

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: David Raya, Myles Lewis-Skelly, Chris Wood, Anthony Elanga

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Chelsea take on West Ham United in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Chelsea vs West Ham United - preview, team news, stats, score & text commentary

articles.description: Saracens centre Alex Lozowski replaces the injured Cadan Murley in the England squad for Saturday's Six Nations match with France at Twickenham.
articles.title: Six Nations: Alex Lozowski replaces injured Cadan Murley in England squad for France match

articles.description: Manchester City complete the signing of Porto midfielder Nico Gonzalez for 60m euros (£50m).
articles.title: Nico Gonzalez: Manchester City complete signing of Porto midfielder

articles.description: Devin Booker becomes the Phoenix Suns' all-time leading points scorer against the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday - but it is not enough to earn victory.
articles.title: NBA: Devin Booker breaks Phoenix Suns scoring record in defeat to Portland
